description: This file defines REST API endpoints for managing notes in a FastAPI application. It includes routes for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, utilizing SQLAlchemy for database interactions and Pydantic schemas for request/response models.

methods.name: schemas.NoteRead create_note_endpoint(note_in: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new note and returns the created note.

methods.name: List[schemas.NoteRead] list_notes_endpoint( skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of records to skip"), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max number of records to return"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Returns a list of notes with pagination.

methods.name: schemas.NoteRead get_note_endpoint( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to retrieve"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID.

methods.name: schemas.NoteRead update_note_endpoint( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to update"), note_in: schemas.NoteUpdate = ..., db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Updates an existing note by its ID.

methods.name: None delete_note_endpoint( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to delete"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

ctags.name: create_note_endpoint
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note_endpoint(note_in: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> schemas./

ctags.name: delete_note_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to delete"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: get_note_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to retrieve"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: list_notes_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of records to skip"), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max number of records to return"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_note_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the note to update"), note_in: schemas.NoteUpdate = ..., db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
